description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Battlepaths is an addictive 2d-RPG featuring neat monster hacking, an excellent loot system, and great variety in character development. Learn skills, use powerful potions, and hunt down the Chaos Overlord.
description.short: Battlepaths is an addictive 2d-RPG featuring neat monster hacking, an excellent loot system, and great variety in character development. Learn skills, use powerful potions, and hunt down the Chaos Overlord.
